name: Aurora
address:
Aurora, Peellagoda,Unawatuna Sri Lank, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9.3/10!(score from 459 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Offering a restaurant, Aurora is located in Unawatuna. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with a work desk and an outdoor seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries.

At Aurora you will find a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, an ironing service and laundry facilities. The property offers free parking. Room service is available.

The property is located just 4.5 km from the popular Galle Fort National Museum and the famous Galle International Cricket Stadium. The Koggala Airport is 9.3 km away.

name: Agnus Unawatuna
address:
Bonavista Road Rumassala, 80000 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9.1/10!(score from 627 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Offering a rooftop with panoramic views of the Indian Ocean and an infinity pool, Agnus Unawatuna - Unawatuna is situated in Unawatuna, less than 1 km from Japanese Peace Pagoda. Located close to Unawatuna Beach and Jungle Beach the property provides free WiFi.

All rooms have an en-suite, coffee and tea making facilities, satellite TV and WiFi.

English Breakfast or Sri Lankan breakfast are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests can grab a bite to eat at the on-site restaurant.

Guests at Agnus Unawatuna - Unawatuna will be able to enjoy activities in and around Unawatuna, like cycling, surfing, diving, snorkeling and hiking.

name: Araliya Beach Resort & Spa Unawatuna- Where you meet the sea all year
address:
Welledewala Road Yaddehimulla, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9/10!(score from 803 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Beachfront and Leisure: Araliya Beach Resort & Spa Unawatuna in Unawatuna offers direct beachfront access, a year-round outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, sun terrace, and lush gardens. Guests can relax on the beach or enjoy the spa facilities, including a steam room and wellness packages.

Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, balconies with sea views, private bathrooms, and modern amenities such as free WiFi, minibars, and flat-screen TVs. Family rooms and interconnected rooms cater to all travellers, ensuring a comfortable stay.

Dining and Entertainment: The resort offers a family-friendly restaurant serving British, Indian, and international cuisines, alongside a bar. Dining options include brunch, lunch, dinner, high tea, and cocktails in traditional, modern, and romantic ambiances.

Prime Location: Located a few steps from Unawatuna Beach and near attractions like the Japanese Peace Pagoda (1.8 km) and Galle Fort (7 km), the resort provides easy access to scuba diving and other activities. Guests appreciate the friendly staff and excellent service support.

name: Sayura Beach Hotel
address:
624 Matara Rd, Dalawella, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9/10!(score from 246 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Offering a barbecue and views of the sea, Sayura Beach Hotel is set in Unawatuna. The hotel has a sun terrace and a private beach area, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. You will find a kettle in the room. All rooms include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.

There is babysitting service at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and diving. The hotel also offers car hire. Japanese Peace Pagoda is 3.2 km from Sayura Beach Hotel, while Yatagala Temple is 2.7 km from the property.
